result.arabic_text: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَآ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ رُشۡدَهُۥ مِن قَبۡلُ وَكُنَّا بِهِۦ عَٰلِمِينَ
result.translation: Ni ukuri, Twarahaye Ibrahimu (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah) uburongozi yararikiye abantu kubukurikira imbere y’irungikwa rya Musa na Haruna, kandi Twari Tuzi neza ko abikwiye;
